network-errors.unknown: Something went wrong while executing your request, please try again later.
network-errors.credentials: You are not authorized to perform this action.
network-errors.forbidden: You are not allowed to perform this action.
network-errors.not-found: The server was unable to find the information you requested.
network-errors.server-offline: The server is offline, the system is temporarily unavailable.
network-errors.server-timeout: The server took too long to respond, please try again. If this keeps happening, please contact the administrator
network-errors.server-cors: There seems to have been a CORS issue with the server. If this keeps happening, please contact the administrator
network-errors.bad-request: Incomplete request sent, please check it and try again.
network-errors.payload-too-large: The file is too large to be uploaded.

activate.title: Activate your account
activate.verification_error: Something went wrong, could not verify activation token.
activate.set_password: Please set a password to activate your account.

password_reset_email_sent.title: E-mail sent
password_reset_email_sent.text: An e-mail with instruction on how to reset your password has been sent to the given email address.

new_password_set.title: New password set
new_password_set.text: Your new password has been set. You can now use it to log in.

errors.valid_email: Must be a valid e-mail address
errors.inactive_account: Account is inactive. Please contact the administrator.

password_requirements.title: The password must:
password_requirements.lowercase_letter: contain at least one lowercase letter
password_requirements.uppercase_letter: contain at least one uppercase letter

home.title: DANCE
home.text: The DANCE system (Dancing and Adjudication Network for Crossing and Evaluation) is an adjudication system for Ballroom competitions.

database.title: Database reset
database.subtitle:
Clear all competitions, dances, etc., and reset the database to the starting state.

If no results are saved for the current event, the event itself will also be deleted.

modal.title: WARNING!
modal.text:
You are about to delete this event.
This is IRREVERSIBLE!
Are you sure you wish to proceed?

results.title: Save event results
results.subtitle: Save the published results of the current event.

modal.title: Event results
modal.saved: Competitions that will have their results saved:

default.title: Create default competitions
default.text1: Choose which competitions to create from the options below, and create all necessary dances, discipline, and classes. If you're not sure if the default values will work the event, you can create everything manually.
default.text2: Doing this will delete any previously created dances, disciplines, and classes.
default.label: Competitions to create:

competition.title: Create new competition
competition.text: Create a new competition for the event. Dances, disciplines and classes can be created through the menu on the right.

new_discipline.title: Add a new discipline to the system

dances.label: Dances
dances.no_data: No dances that don't have a discipline available

delete_discipline.title: Delete discipline
delete_discipline.text: Are you sure you wish to delete {discipline}?

new_dance.title: Add a new dance to the system

order.label: Order
order.hint: Used to determine in which order dances are shown (ascending).

delete_dance.title: Delete dance
delete_dance.text: Are you sure you wish to delete {dance}?

new_class.title: Add a new class to the system

delete_class.title: Delete class
delete_class.text: Are you sure you wish to delete {class}?

new_adjudicator.title: Add a new adjudicator to the system

password.label: Password
password.hint: Leave blank to keep the original password

delete_adjudicator.title: Delete adjudicator
delete_adjudicator.text: Are you sure you wish to delete {name}?

assignments.title: Adjudicator assignments
assignments.text: There are unsaved assignments. Please remember to save.

csv.title: CSV mass import
csv.subtitle: Import from a list csv strings ("number","name","team name","role"), where role is either "lead", "follow", or "both"
csv.label: CSV list

new_dancer.title: Add a new dancer to the system

competitions.label: Competitions
competitions.hint: Competitions that the person has signed up for solo.

delete_dancer.title: Delete dancer
delete_dancer.text: Are you sure you wish to delete {name}?

csv.title: CSV mass import
csv.subtitle: Import from a list csv strings ("lead number","follow number","discipline name","class name")
csv.text:
Couples that do not exist will be created. The discipline and class name are used to determine what competition to add the couple to

You can also omit the discipline and class names to just create a couple, without adding them to a competition.
csv.label: CSV list

new_couple.title: Add a new couple to the system

competitions.label: Competitions
competitions.hint: Competitions the couple is currently signed up for.

delete_couple.title: Delete couple
delete_couple.text: Are you sure you wish to delete couple {number}, {lead} and {follow}?

final_results.title: Publish results
final_results.subtitle: Choose competitions to publish the results of

hints.re_dance: {num} couple(s) are placed through to the next round without having to participate in the re-dance

heats.label: Heats
heats.hint: {heats} heat(s) of up to {couples} couples per floor ({total} couple(s) total)
heats.hint_no_floor: {heats} heat(s) of up to {couples} couple(s) ({total} couple(s) total)

cutoff.label: Cutoff
cutoff.hint: Number of marks that is the cutoff for dancing the next round

adjudicators_floors.title: Floor assignments
adjudicators_floors.text: If a competition can have multiple floors, adjudicators must be assigned to a floor before you can create the first round.

adjudicators_roles.title: Role assignments
adjudicators_roles.text:
For a competition where couples change per dance, adjudicators have a specific assignment.

An adjudicator can be assigned to mark individual dancers or the couple.

If an adjudicator is assigned to mark both, his/her marks count for both dancers, otherwise it just counts for the assigned role.

next_round.title: Create next round
next_round.subtitle:
The highlighted couples are the ones going on the the next round.
If a couple will not participate in the next round (whether the have to dance it or not), you can uncheck them from the starting column.

add_remove_couple.title: Add/Remove couple
add_remove_couple.subtitle: Before the first round has started, you can add couples to or remove couples from the round.

modal.title: WARNING!
modal.text:
You are about to delete this round (heats, marks, etc.).

This is IRREVERSIBLE!

Are you sure you wish to proceed?

text.not_split: Split the couples between the competitions of this qualification round.
text.split: The qualification is already split. If you wish re-do it, remove all the dancers from the qualification rounds first.

modal.title: Split qualification
modal.text: Choose a split for the rounds listed below. The competitions from top to bottom correspond to the numbers from left to right.

split.label: Split options
split.hint: The splits are sorted from most homogeneous to least.

publish.title: Heat list publication
publish.is_published: The heat list for this round is published and visible online.

subtitles.no_re_dance: {num} couples to next round without re-dance

modal.title: Warning!
modal.text:
Marking everything as not present for the {dance} is permanent.

Are you sure you wish to proceed?

modal.title: Move couple
modal.subtitle: Choose a couple to move to a different heat.

from.label: Heat
from.hint: Heat from which to move the couple

to.label: Heat
to.hint: Heat to move the couple to

floor_management.not_needed: Floor management is not used for the final.

modal.title: Evaluate round
modal.text: Are you sure you want to evaluate this round?

adjudication.not_tracking_adjudicators: Adjudicators are not actively tracked if the dance is not enabled.
adjudication.general_look_round_explanation:
Since this round is a general look, no marks will be given.

Please check the progress tab to configure the next round

floors.label: Floors
floors.hint: The maximum number of floors that the competition can use.

date.label: Date
date.hint: This is used to indicate to adjudicators on what day they have to adjudicate.

mode.label: Mode
mode.hint: Determines how partners are chosen for this competition.

qualification.label: Qualification
qualification.hint: The qualification round for this competition. Leave blank if this competition has no qualification.

modal.title: Warning!
modal.text: Are you sure that you wish to delete the {competition} competition?

start.subtitle:
Please select a competition from below to adjudicate.
Once you are done, please return to this page.

If there are no competitions enabled, please reload.

floor_manager.title: Floor manager
floor_manager.text: Choose a competition from the menu.
floor_manager.not_available: The floor manager data for {competition} is not available yet.
